scan_metadata.description: waf - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks global WAF rule conditions
check_functions.description: Ensures global WAF rules have required conditions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks global WAF rule group is not empty
check_functions.description: Ensures global WAF rule group is not empty

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks logging for global WebACL
check_functions.description: Ensures logging is enabled for global WebACL

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks global WebACL has rules
Code Executable - Checks regional WAF rule conditions
check_functions.description: Ensures regional WAF rules have required conditions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks regional WAF rule group is not empty
check_functions.description: Ensures regional WAF rule group is not empty

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks regional WebACL has rules
Code Executable - Checks intrusion detection for WebACL
check_functions.description: Ensures intrusion detection is enabled for WebACL
